question: a shop produces sarongs . the daily average production is given by 5 n + 20 , where n is the number of workers aside from the owner . in the first k days , 500 units are produced , and then 5 workers are added to the team . after another k days , the cumulative total is 1200 . how many workers were part of the latter production run ?

the population of a city increases by 9 % per year but due to migration it decrease by 1 % per years . what will be the percentage increase in population in 3 years ?
a present value of a machine is $ 128000 . its value depletiation rate is 25 % per annum then find the machine value after 3 years ?
a trader sells 23 meters of cloth for rs . 529 at the profit of rs . 5 per metre of cloth . what is the cost price of one metre of cloth ?
a man can row 4.2 km / hr in still water . it takes him twice as long to row upstream as to row downstream . what is the rate of the current ?
a ferry can transport 100 tons of vehicles . automobiles range in weight from 1,800 to 3,200 pounds . what is the greatest number of automobiles that can be loaded onto the ferry ?
if a = 105 and a ^ 3 = 21 × 25 × 45 × b , what is the value of b ?
90 students represent x percent of the boys at jones elementary school . if the boys at jones elementary make up 30 % of the total school population of x students , what is x ?

a certain clock marks every hour by striking a number of times equal to the hour , and the time required for a stroke is exactly equal to the time interval between strokes . at 6 : 00 the time lapse between the beginning of the first stroke and the end of the last stroke is 11 seconds . at 12 : 00 , how many seconds elapse between the beginning of the first stroke and the end of the last stroke ?

working at their respective constant rates , machine a makes 100 copies in 12 minutes and machine b makes 150 copies in 15 minutes . if these machines work simultaneously at their respective rates for 30 minutes , what is the total number of copies that they will produce ?

in a sample of college students , 50 percent are third year students and 70 percent are not second - year students . what fraction of those students who are not third - year students are second - year students ?
a train 150 m long is running with a speed of 60 km / hr . in what time will it pass a man who is running at 6 km / hr in the direction opposite to that in which the train is going ?
a and b together can do a piece of work in 6 days and a alone can do it in 12 days . in how many days can b alone can do it ?
the diagonal of a square is 40 m . the area of the square is :
lilly has 10 fish and rosy has 12 fish . in total , how many fish do they have in all ?

the denominator of a fraction is 15 greater than the numerator . if the numerator and the denominator are increased by 3 , the resulting fraction is equal to 3 â  „ 4 . what is the value of the original fraction ?
two numbers n and 16 have lcm = 48 and gcf = 4 . find n .
two vessels p and q contain 62.5 % and 87.5 % of alcohol respectively . if 4 litres from vessel p is mixed with 4 litres from vessel q , the ratio of alcohol and water in the resulting mixture is ?
if the sides of a triangle are 26 cm , 25 cm and 10 cm , what is its area ?
the price of lunch for 20 people was $ 300 including a 20 % gratuity for service . what was the average price per person , excluding the gratuity ?

the weight of every type a widget is the same , the weight of every type b widget is the same , and the weight of every type c widget is the same . if the weight of 7 type a widgets is equal to the weight of 2 type b widgets , and the weight of 3 type b widgets is equal to the weight of 7 type c widgets . what is the ratio of the total weight of 1 type a widget and 1 type b widget , to the total weight of 1 type b widget and 1 type c widget ?

how many positive integers less than 100 have a remainder of 5 when divided by 13 ?
what least number must be added to 686 , so that the sum is completely divisible by 5 ?
a cycle is bought for rs . 450 and sold for rs . 520 , find the gain percent ?

in a school 10 % of the boys are same in number as 1 / 3 th of the girls . what is the ratio of boys to the girls in the school ?
j is 25 % less than p and 20 % less than t . t is q % less than p . what is the value of q ?
a thief steals a car at 2.30 pm and drives it at 60 kmph . the theft is discovered at 3 pm and the owner sets off in another car at 75 kmph when will he overtake the thief

tom traveled the entire 80 miles trip . if he did the first 30 miles of at a constant rate 30 miles per hour and the remaining trip of at a constant rate 50 miles per hour , what is the his average speed , in miles per hour ?
excluding stoppages , the speed of a bus is 72 kmph and including stoppages , it is 45 kmph . for how many minutes does the bus stop per hour ?

a man buys an article for $ 110 . and sells it for $ 125 . find the gain percent ?

he total marks obtained by a student in physics , chemistry and mathematics is 180 more than the marks obtained by him in physics . what is the average mark obtained by him in chemistry and mathematics ?

a dishonest dealer professes to sell goods at the cost price but uses a weight of 850 grams per kg , what is his percent ?

find 40 % of 320

john and jacob set out together on bicycle traveling at 15 and 12 miles per hour , respectively . after 40 minutes , john stops to fix a flat tire . if it takes john two hour to fix the flat tire and jacob continues to ride during this time , how many hours will it take john to catch up to jacob assuming he resumes his ride at 15 miles per hour ? ( consider john ' s deceleration / acceleration before / after the flat to be negligible )

a part - time employee whose hourly wage was increased by 15 percent decided to reduce the number of hours worked per week so that the employee ' s total weekly income would remain unchanged . by what percent should the number of hours worked be reduced ?
a clock shows the time as 10 a . m . if the minute hand gains 5 minutes every hour , how many minutes will the clock gain by 4 p . m . ?
a train 280 m long is running at 70 kmph . in how much time will it pass a platform 210 m long ?

in township k each property is taxed at 8 percent of its assessed value . if the assessed value of a property in township k is increased from $ 18,000 to $ 28,000 , by how much will the property tax increase ?
a walks at 10 kmph and 7 hours after his start , b cycles after him at 20 kmph . how far from the start does b catch up with a ?
in a kilometer race , a beats b by 60 meters or 15 seconds . what time does a take to complete the race ?
tom purchased 8 kg of apples at the rate of 70 per kg and 9 kg of mangoes at the rate of 45 per kg . how much amount did he pay to the shopkeeper ?
